query:
-- Estatísticas gerais atualizadas
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_backups,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sucesso,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as falhas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'in_progress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as em_progresso,
  MIN(created_at) as primeiro_backup,
  MAX(created_at) as ultimo_backup
FROM backup_history;

-- Últimos 5 backups após dry run
SELECT id, tenant_id, backup_type, status, created_at 
FROM backup_history 
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_backups,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sucesso,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as falhas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'in_progress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as em_progresso,
  MIN(created_at) as primeiro_backup,
  MAX(created_at) as ultimo_backup
FROM backup_history;

-- Últimos 5 backups após dry run
SELECT id, tenant_id, backup_type, status, created_at 
FROM backup_history 
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 5;
